description:
Easy, reliable PDF creation from all applications.


- fixed a bug that sometimes caused incorrect text output in CAD files
- fixed bugs that sometimes caused crashes when double-clicking on right-clicking on text in printed content
- performance improvements when working with full-page scanned images
- fixed a bug that caused GetFontData errors when opening some PDF files
- fixed a bug that sometimes caused ZUGFeRD/Factur-X metadata to be lost when opening PDF files
- fixed bugs that sometimes caused dialog controls to be incorrectly sized
